carry over.policy: A student who fails a course must retake it in a future semester. Repeated failure may delay graduation or affect CGPA.

cgpa calculation.info: CGPA = Total Grade Points / Total Credit Units. Grade Points are calculated by multiplying the credit units  by the grade score (A=5, B=4, etc).

services: Available through the Student Affairs Unit

procedure: Choose courses based on departmental guidelines

policy: All students must dress decently and in accordance with Islamic values.
Transparent, tight, or revealing clothing is prohibited.
Male students should avoid sagging trousers and inappropriate slogans on clothing.
Female students are expected to wear a proper hijab and loose-fitting clothes.
Dressing is monitored at gates, hostels, and lecture halls.

summary: Copying from others or prepared notes

examination.hospital_bed_exam: Allowed with prior application, extra fee of ₦5,000, and transport of exam materials within 45 minutes.

investigation_process: Reported by invigilator to Exam Officer
offences: Copying from others or prepared notes

penalties.Group C: Loss of marks, paper cancellation, warning

fees.description: The fees structure includes tuition, registration, hostel, and examination fees. Special charges may apply for hospital bed exams (₦5,000 per paper).
fees.maternity_leave_fee: Free, but coursework and exam postponements are regulated

requirements: Minimum CGPA as specified by the department
Successful defense of final year project
No outstanding disciplinary issues or unpaid fees

gsp_programme.description: Covers NUC-mandated General Studies, Qur’an memorization, Peace & Conflict, Disaster Management, Entrepreneurship

rules: No male visitors in female hostel rooms and vice versa

e-library_access: Calibre ebooks, KOHA catalog, OER, Britannica
library.name: Bilya Sanda (Khadimul Islam) Library
rules: No eating, smoking, or loud discussion
Fines for late return: ₦50/day, ₦150/day for recalled books
Maximum 4 books for students, 6 for staff
services: Access to physical and e-library resources
Use of KOHA library management system
Referral to higher hospitals for serious cases

maternity_leave.policy: 12-week leave, must submit certificate 6 weeks before delivery
maternity_leave.postponement: Permitted between 6 weeks before and 9 weeks after delivery

sick_leave.international_cases: Must be verified by Nigerian embassy or approved body
sick_leave.submission: Must be authenticated and sent to HOD via Health Services

guidelines: Choose a relevant topic approved by your supervisor
Follow the departmental format (cover page, abstract, chapters, references)
Avoid plagiarism and submit before deadline

SBRS.IJMB: 1-year programme for 200L admission via JAMB DE
SBRS.Pre-Degree: For students lacking O-Level or UTME qualification

security.drug_policy: Zero tolerance for drug abuse – offenders face NDLEA prosecution

counseling_services: Help with depression, anxiety, and personal issues
rules: No male visitors in female hostel rooms and vice versa

student_centre.facilities: Shops, food stalls, and stationery outlets

penalties: Expulsion for rape, cultism, and forgery
Rustication for indecent acts or illegal events
Warnings or disciplinary hearings for misconduct
rules: No indecent ceremonies or events without approval

popular_courses: M.Sc. & Ph.D. in Business Admin, Economics, Computer Science, Islamic Studies
